header.title: Android Game
header.subtitle: Development Services
header.description: Kevuru Games is an Android game development company that has tremendous experience in creating top-notch 2D and 3D games for a wide variety of audiences. We provide modern and technically advanced Android game development services that allow our customers to get the desired product on time, according to all requirements.

section1.subtitle: Games development

services.title: Deep development skill base
services.description: With a team of expert developers bringing skills and experience in specific techniques, Aetsoft delivers best-in-class NFT solutions across codebases and libraries.

services.name: We’re still learning, too
services.title: We’re still learning, too
services.description: Your business doesn’t stand still. Neither do we. We’re constantly improving our skills and understanding to deliver cutting-edge advice and services for you.

section2.title: Our Android Game
section2.subtitle: Development Services
section2.description: If you are looking for the best studio to hire Android game developers, then you can breathe easy: you've come to the right place. Our Android game development studio knows how to create games that will definitely resonate with your target audience. We can offer you the following services.

services.title: Full-Cycle Android Game Development
services.description: Our Android game developers have the expertise, technical capabilities and artistic vision to create a game product of any complexity from scratch. We think over and implement the most relevant game mechanics in the game so that the players appreciate it.

services.title: Assets Creation
services.description: Each game in our Android studio is filled with juicy and eye-catching graphics, beautiful and smooth animation and attractive assets with which the player wants to continuously interact. We create perfectly optimized game elements for the best performance.

services.title: UX/UI Design
services.description: The user interface plays an important role in the convenience of players interacting with the product and their desire to continue playing sessions. Therefore, we pay close attention to creating an intuitive interface that does not distract from the game and fits perfectly into its setting and style.

services.title: Testing
services.description: Our Android studio gaming services include comprehensive and effective game quality control based on development criteria and goals. We track bugs and errors, ensure high performance and compatibility, establish social integration, and so on so that there are no complaints about the game.

services.title: Support and Maintenance
services.description: After the end of development, we continue to provide support and maintenance for the game. This service includes the creation of additional game elements, new levels and mechanics, making changes to the functions and design of game elements based on player comments and more.

services.title: Support and Maintenance
services.description: After the end of development, we continue to provide support and maintenance for the game. This service includes the creation of additional game elements, new levels and mechanics, making changes to the functions and design of game elements based on player comments and more.

section3.title: Cooperation Models
section3.subtitle: Development Services
section3.description: We offer services to our clients based on several interaction models that can be tailored to meet your specific needs. You can choose one of the available models or combine them. We are ready to help you by choosing the most suitable model for you.

services.title: Fixed Price
services.description: We offer innovative Android studio game development solutions at a fixed price that is based on the detailed specifications of the project.

services.title: Time and Material
services.description: T&M pricing includes flexible rates and agile project execution. This model is suitable for long term projects with changing requirements.

services.title: Outsourcing Managed Delivery
services.description: We offer not only an experienced team capable of providing Android game development services, but also managed delivery to ensure that all services are delivered end-to-end.

services.title: Dedicated Team
services.description: A dedicated offshore team is offered as an extension of your own infrastructure with full support and access to all resources and facilities.

section4.title: Technologies
section4.subtitle: We Are Well Versed In
section4.description: If you are looking for the best studio to hire Android game developers, then you can breathe easy: you've come to the right place. Our Android game development studio knows how to create games that will definitely resonate with your target audience. We can offer you the following services.

services.name: CLanguage
services.description: Fast and versatile programming language with a clear structure, allowing you to create both small and large-scale projects for the PC and mobile devices.

services.name: CPlusLanguage
services.description: A comprehensive programming language for creating demanding AAA projects with rich visualization with multiplayer support on Unreal Engine.

services.name: CSharpLanguage
services.description: A powerful yet simple programming language that makes it easy to create indie games in Unity 3D and CryEngine for PC and mobile devices.

services.name: Html
services.description: A simple language with fast implementation used to create browser games and indie projects: table games, tile-matching games, slots, and others.

services.name: Unity-Technologies
services.description: Cross-platform game engine featuring component-oriented approach and support for a huge number of platforms, technologies, and API.

services.name: Unreal-Engine
services.description: State-of-the-art engine with real-time photorealistic rendering, dynamic physics and effects, realistic animation and reliable data translation.

section6.title: Our Process
section6.subtitle: Development Services
section6.description: The process of finding and appointing specialists suitable for your project takes place in a few simple steps.

services.title: Analysing customer requirements
services.description: We carefully study the client's project and the specifics of tasks for the implementation of which specialists are required (1 day)

services.title: Formation of selection criteria
services.description: We form a list of key hard and soft skills that the required specialists must possess for a specific project and tasks (1 day)

services.title: Finding the required candidates
services.description: We monitor our base to find the necessary specialists with the required skills and select the most suitable candidates (2-4 days)

services.title: The first stage of the interview
services.description: Our HR experts conduct interviews to confirm the conformity of the candidate's soft skills to the project requirements (1-5 days)

services.title: The second stage of the interview
services.description: Our technical experts conduct conduct interviews to confirm the conformity of the candidate's hard skills to the project requirements (1-5 days)

services.title: Candidate feedback and shortlisting
services.description: We provide interviewed candidates with feedback regarding the suitability of their experience with project requirements (1-3 days)

services.title: Approval of specialists and offer
services.description: We inform the client about the selected specialists, receive feedback and approval and make them a working offer (1-3 days)

services.title: Choosing and agreeing a start date
services.description: We discuss with the hired specialists the time of starting work convenient for them and the client (2 weeks after the offer)

services.title: Finding the required candidates
services.description: We monitor our base to find the necessary specialists with the required skills and select the most suitable candidates (2-4 days)

services.name: Customized Android Mobile Game Development
services.title: Customized Android Mobile Game Development
services.description: Our Android game company provides efficient, high-quality and fully customized game development according to the wishes and requirements of the client. A flexible model of cooperation allows us to adapt to the required budget, select the optimal team composition, and be on time within the specified time frame with the implementation of all set goals.

services.name: Rich Experience in the Gaming Industry
services.title: Rich Experience in the Gaming Industry
services.description: We have been working in the Android video game development sphere for more than 8 years and we know perfectly well how to light not passable, but memorable games with unique graphics and original presentation. Our team understands all the ins and outs of game mechanics and engines, thanks to which our Android games are always perfectly optimized, dynamic and fun.

services.name: Most Relevant Technologies and Techniques

services.description: We adhere to the highest standards in the Android gaming industry, follow the latest trends in the gaming market and use the most advanced technologies, approaches and creative ideas to always be one step ahead. When technological updates appear, we immediately take them into service and implement them in our work.

services.name: Android Games with 10+ Million Downloads
services.title: Android Games with 10+ Million Downloads
services.description: It is important for our team not only to create a high-quality product, but also to bring maximum material value to the client. We are focused on creating exclusive, engaging and unique games that resonate with the gaming world, collect thousands of comments, get into the featured lists in the Google Play Store, and receive millions of downloads.

section9.title: Types of Android Games
section9.subtitle: We Develop
section9.description: The key aspects of our approach to Android game app development are solid technical knowledge and excellent orientation in the players' desires and expectations. We follow all the wishes of the client and at the same time offer innovative and relevant solutions to increase the player's engagement and achieve a large number of game downloads.

services.title: Android Match-Three Game Development
services.description: We create always relevant match-three games with intuitive, uncomplicated and at the same time addictive mechanics. Our games have the right balance of difficulty, perfect for your target audience, dynamic learning curve, and eye-catching visuals.

services.title: Android Action-Adventure Game Developmentnt
services.description: For games of this genre, our team thinks over a fascinating plot, provides active and engaging gameplay and skillfully combines classic quest puzzles with game tests for speed, reaction and endurance.

services.title: Android Fighting Game Development
services.description: Android game programming for fighting games involves creating an engaging battle arena and developing a lot of impressive fighting techniques. Our games enable the player to play with both AI and friends to enhance the competitive component.

services.title: Android Simulation Game Development
services.description: A very popular genre now, the simulation game needs serious preparation and flawless mechanics for maximum realism. We develop sports, economic and life simulators with stunning detail and thoughtful game design to completely immerse the player in the gaming environment.

services.title: Android Strategy Game Development
services.description: Make your players apply strategic thinking, analyze a lot and make the right decisions with our strategies. We offer addictive gameplay, an interesting plot and other features depending on the chosen setting, from large-scale battles to the development of the city and army.

services.title: Android Arcade Puzzle Game Development
services.description: Arcade games are simple, fun and addictive. Our Android game developers offer a wide variety of arcade games from elementary to intricate story-driven ones with the ability to play indefinitely, get rewards and achievements, and always make new challenges for players.

header.title: Non-Fungible (NFT)
header.subtitle: Token Development
header.description: Blockchain App Factory is an experienced NFT development company that helps you create non-fungible tokens. Tokenize your creations with us today to reap the benefits!
header.description1: Do you need to create a multi-functional NFT marketplace running on top speeds or tokenize your digital collectibles and introduce a new unique, non-fungible token tradable across multiple marketplaces so you could easily find the best deal? Our NFT developers are ready to help you with any of these tasks!

section1.title: Launch An NFT Project with
section1.subtitle: Our NFT Development Services
section1.description: Blockchain App Factory has been a world-class NFT development services provider creating NFTs for enterprises and creators. Our NFT developers have extensive experience in developing NFTs, making them adapt to new technologies and business challenges. We can create NFT assets per your requirements while ensuring your NFTs stay with current trends.
section1.description1: Our expertise in developing smart contract programs assures NFT ventures to work with maximum transparency in their operations. It is also easy for you to create, sell, and trade NFT assets created with assistance from us. Contact us to schedule a free consultation to plan your new NFT business.

section2.title: Intriguing Features of our Non Fungible
section2.subtitle: Token Development
section2.description: NFTs offer a lot of features advantageous to businesses, creators, and collectors. We will see some of the points below.

services.title: Ownership
services.description: NFTs offer proof of ownership for buyers, helping them to truly own the asset supported by the NFT on the blockchain.

services.title: Transferability
services.description: NFT assets can be transferred easily as transactions involve blockchains which make the process quicker and verifiable.

services.title: Royalties for Reselling
services.description: Creators can earn royalties easily whenever an NFT is resold by including relevant conditions in smart contracts.

services.title: Inclusive Growth
services.description: NFT assets can be transferred easily as transactions involve blockchains which make the process quicker and verifiable.

services.title: Initial Consultation
services.description: Our experts consult with you to understand your business requirements and offer insights to enhance your new venture to reach target markets.

services.title: Blueprint Creation
services.description: Your NFT project’s blueprint is created by our experts after consulting with you. This includes the project development campaign and its long-term goals.

services.title: Development
services.description: Then, Our NFT Developers start developing NFTs for your project using advanced technology to ensure all your business needs are met while ensuring Web3 ethics are met.

services.title: Quality Assurance
services.description: Our QA testers test the NFTs and smart contracts using multiple methods to ensure everything is working perfectly by resolving all defects found.

services.title: Launch and Maintain
services.description: Finally, your NFT project is launched for public trading, and we offer continuous maintenance services to ensure your venture stays with the trends.

services.title: Launch and Maintain
services.description: Finally, your NFT project is launched for public trading, and we offer continuous maintenance services to ensure your venture stays with the trends.

section4.title: Our NFT Development
section4.subtitle: Company Offers
section4.description: Our company offers many types of NFTs for businesses that, include the following:

services.title: Utility NFTs
services.description: We create NFTs with multiple utilities that can include virtual and real-world perks to enhance their functionality.

services.title: Play-to-Earn NFTs
services.description: Our experts create NFT assets that can be used in Play-to-Earn games as avatar skins, weapons, vehicles, and equipment.

services.title: Fractional NFTs:
services.description: We can develop NFTs that represent fractional ownership for high-priced products such as artworks and collectibles.

services.title: Art NFTs
services.description: Introduce a revolutionary, decentralized, hence safe and autonomous, way of supporting NFT artists and startups through crowdfunding with a bespoke NFT launchpad solution.

services.title: Phygital NFTs
services.description: We are capable of creating NFTs that offer digital and physical experiences at the same time, enforced by smart contracts.

services.title: Celebrity NFTs
services.description: We can develop NFT collectibles of different types for celebrities that bring them closer to their fans digitally.

services.title: Music NFTs
services.description: Our professionals can create NFTs representing music albums that can bring music creators and their fans close together.

services.title: Sports NFTs
services.description: We can create NFTs for sports organizations that represent their iconic moments in forms such as cards and video clips.

services.title: Fashion NFTs

section5.title: Blockchain App Factory’s Decentralized
section5.subtitle: NFT Development Services
section5.description: At Blockchain App Factory, we ensure to create NFTs that align well with the principles of decentralization. It means that these NFTs can operate seamlessly across all elements of Web3 technology, including decentralized finance (DeFi). DeFi has become popular in the crypto world for its emerging use cases for the virtual communities of tomorrow.
section5.description1: NFTs in decentralized finance can be used as collateral for crypto loaning processes. With Web3 becoming more widely accepted, decentralized banking with NFT assets is an exciting prospect for the future. Our experts ensure all our NFT projects have flexible smart contracts that can be optimized for DeFi collateralization.

We also ensure to stay true to all Web3 ethics so that your NFTs can work for a long time. Get in touch with us to begin working on your new NFT project.

header.title: Metaverse
header.subtitle: Token Development
header.description: Blockchain App Factory is an experienced NFT development company that helps you create non-fungible tokens. Tokenize your creations with us today to reap the benefits!
header.description1: Do you need to create a multi-functional NFT marketplace running on top speeds or tokenize your digital collectibles and introduce a new unique, non-fungible token tradable across multiple marketplaces so you could easily find the best deal? Our NFT developers are ready to help you with any of these tasks!

section1.title: Launch An NFT Project with
section1.subtitle: Our NFT Development Services
section1.description: Blockchain App Factory has been a world-class NFT development services provider creating NFTs for enterprises and creators. Our NFT developers have extensive experience in developing NFTs, making them adapt to new technologies and business challenges. We can create NFT assets per your requirements while ensuring your NFTs stay with current trends.
section1.description1: Our expertise in developing smart contract programs assures NFT ventures to work with maximum transparency in their operations. It is also easy for you to create, sell, and trade NFT assets created with assistance from us. Contact us to schedule a free consultation to plan your new NFT business.

section2.title: Intriguing Features of our Non Fungible
section2.subtitle: Token Development
section2.description: NFTs offer a lot of features advantageous to businesses, creators, and collectors. We will see some of the points below.

services.title: Ownership
services.description: NFTs offer proof of ownership for buyers, helping them to truly own the asset supported by the NFT on the blockchain.

services.title: Transferability
services.description: NFT assets can be transferred easily as transactions involve blockchains which make the process quicker and verifiable.

services.title: Royalties for Reselling
services.description: Creators can earn royalties easily whenever an NFT is resold by including relevant conditions in smart contracts.

services.title: Inclusive Growth
services.description: NFT assets can be transferred easily as transactions involve blockchains which make the process quicker and verifiable.

services.title: Initial Consultation
services.description: Our experts consult with you to understand your business requirements and offer insights to enhance your new venture to reach target markets.

services.title: Blueprint Creation
services.description: Your NFT project’s blueprint is created by our experts after consulting with you. This includes the project development campaign and its long-term goals.

services.title: Development
services.description: Then, Our NFT Developers start developing NFTs for your project using advanced technology to ensure all your business needs are met while ensuring Web3 ethics are met.

services.title: Quality Assurance
services.description: Our QA testers test the NFTs and smart contracts using multiple methods to ensure everything is working perfectly by resolving all defects found.

services.title: Launch and Maintain
services.description: Finally, your NFT project is launched for public trading, and we offer continuous maintenance services to ensure your venture stays with the trends.

services.title: Launch and Maintain
